page.title: 04Barton Wind Bands
page.content: This thriving organisation comprises of 3 bands,Junior,Youth and Concert. There are 53 members of the Junior Band who all attend the Thomas Russell Junior School.The Youth Band age range is 11 to 14 and the 40 members have reached a standard equal to grade 3. The Concert Band is a development of the Youth Band with an age range of 14 to 17.These 19 musicians have grades of 5 and above.The Junior Band is conducted by Mr.Eric Fern and the Youth and Concert Bands by Mr.Ron Banks.The bands have been in existance now for 10 Years and have earned a fine reputation for their music.Instruments played include a range of Brass,Woodwind and Percussion.The Bands give 2 regular concerts a year in the John Taylor High school and raise funds by playing in shopping precincts and at local functions.
